transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haanji sir.
Executive: Ji very good morning Kajal mam, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Good morning sir, bilkul theek bataiye.
Executive: Kya ho gaya tha aapko matlab lead pe chal rahe the aap?
Customer: Haan main actually kar rahi thi ek second.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Down time hai.
Executive: Down time hai. Achcha. Yeah. Okay. IndiaMART account login hai ya kya samne?
Customer: IndiaMART pe.
Executive: Haan login kiya hua hai abhi aapne?
Customer: Haan login hai.
Executive: Login hai. Theek hai. Mujhe kuch parameters aapko discuss karne the regarding apni services ko leke. First of all aapka jaise ki aapne wapas se use kiya jaise maine aapki complaint resolve ki thi. Aapka complaint tha bulk buyer ka. Uske baad aapne use kiya?
Customer: Uh main to nahi lekin koi aur use kar raha hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi koi use nahi kar raha. Last bar mein isse koi bhi account opening ke liye gayi thi main.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Na inquiry pe reply hua hai, na buylead activity hui hai, na for that moment kuch bhi nahi hua hai yaha pe.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Aapke matlab access mein kaun use karne wala tha waise?
Customer: Team mein hai koi to wo use kar raha hai.
Executive: Sorry, kaun?
Customer: Team mein hai aapke team ko.
Executive: Aapki voice bahut jyada kam aa rahi hai. Thoda loud bolenge?
Customer: Main ye keh rahi hu main jyada team ko jaanti nahi hu to mujhe exactly name nahi yaad.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha. Koi koi nahi koi problem nahi. Waise koi kisi ne use nahi kiya hai waise just for just permission. Yaha pe kisi ne account opening nahi karaya agar aap nahi the to. Just aap ek bar agar aa gaye hain wapas aap ek bar wapas se use kar lijiyega services ko. Jaise ki aap complaint aayi thi bulk leads ke liye to bulk leads mein maine aapko send kar liya tha. To just use karna hai hume. Correct hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Order value ka aur lead type ka filter use karna hai. Aur hamara ek jaise buyers hai kaafi sare jo requirement dalte hain. Usme aapne notice kiya hoga kai bar kai jagah pe na ki wo nahi dalte order value nahi dalte hain ya quantity nahi dalte hain. Lekin maine aapko bataya tha ki buyer detail check kariyega uska buyer behavior pata chal jata hai. Jitna jyada purana hai GST verified hai aur kitni requirement apne regularly dalte hain product ki ki requirement pehle bhi dal chuka hai sir sir ka. To un sab cheezon se aap kar sakte hain just wo bulk order hamare close ho sakte hain yaha pe.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ab jaise aapka online ho aap ek bar buylead section mein jao main aapko idea wapas se de deta hu thoda sa us hisab se bhi. Buyleads mein.
Executive: Ji buylead section mein jaiye.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Recent ka filter lagaiyega recent aur Indian ka filter lagaiyega.
Customer: Recent, haan sir.
Executive: Haan recent aur Indian.
Executive: Theek hai abhi aapke paas isme lead aa rahi hai. Sabse pehli lead hai Pune se LPG hose pipe ki.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Length 1.5 meter made in India. Ye lead actually aapki catalog view wali hai. This might be just ki aap catalog view isme daala hua hai.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Hai na? Ab isko jaise humne isme catalog dekha hai to of course aap company ke bare mein jaante bhi honge pehle se. Aap usko contact kar sakte ho aur yaha pe buyer detail mein aap check karoge to member since 3 plus years se hai. Kya kya buy kar chuka hai ceiling fan, heater, cooler, motor, mixer grinder spare parts wagera ye requirement 14 requirement tak dal chuka hai ye hamare taraf. Aur active bhi hai. Call wagera mein saat logon ka customer service ka reply bhi saat bar kar chuka hai yaha pe. Aur company ka iski company ka mail ID, mobile number aur company address sab kuch iska verified hai yaha pe aap check kar rahe honge available details mein. To ek bar isko contact kar lijiye.
Customer: Haan 12 hours purani lead hai ye.
Executive: Kya cheez mam?
Customer: 12 ghante ki purani lead hai na ye?
Executive: Haan haan right.
Customer: To hum kar sakte hain isko?
Executive: Haan haan kar sakte hain. Abhi recent lead wali koi bhi nahi aayi hai. Recent mein recent pe hi hu aapke sath aur Indian filter lagaya hua hai tabhi to 12 ghante se koi lead abhi aayi nahi hai aapki related. Ji. Aur jo aayi bhi hogi to sold out ho gayi hai.
Executive: To theek hai to filhal hume jo hai wo available unko contact karna padega. To wohi contact kar lijiye niche ki taraf aap dekhoge ek aur option hai. LPG gas pipe fitting residential star. Jaise pipe fitting ka hai ye. Aap log karke dete hain kya LPG pipe fitting?
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: LPG pipe fitting karke dete hain kya?
Customer: Haan dete hain.
Executive: Okay. To ye isme quantity is tarah inko chahiye monthly requirement hai. Isko is product base base work lag raha hai mujhe. Isko hum contact kar sakte hain contact buyer mein aap check kar lenge yaha pe.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai. Ek niche dekhiye ek Bhubaneswar chahiye LPG hose pipe ki. 20 unit requirement hai lekin likha hua hai sample for bulk order.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hai na? Ye bhi isliye isko bhi contact kariye kyunki ye apna aapko bada order de sakta hai. To kuch ye sab cheeze observe karke hume lead leni padegi. Jisse aapko bulk requirement aapko yaha pe mil jayega hamesha.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai clear hai? Baaki aapka abhi kuch hi din hue hain waise to abhi aaye. Aapko itna idea shayad na ho kitna kya IndiaMART se business hota hai waise. Koi kuch confirm kiya tha aapne last jo bhi handle kar rahe the account kitna kya business aa raha hai IndiaMART se ya kuch aisa kuch?
Customer: Actually calls jo hai wo kisi aur ke paas receive hote hain to mujhe exactly idea nahi hai.
Executive: Okay. Abhi tak number bhi aapne change nahi karaya isme apna?
Customer: Nahi nahi karaya kisi aur ka hai.
Executive: Apna number please add karwa lijiye yaha pe apna taki aapke paas bhi following ho sake. Yaha pe aapko dikha deta hu settings mein jaiyega ek bar.
Customer: Hmm ji.
Executive: Settings mein PNS call settings kariyega third option.
Customer: PNS call.
Executive: Aapki nahi nahi settings mein jaiye settings mein PNS call settings hoga.
Customer: Isme add more number.
Executive: Add more number. Abhi add more number pe aapka nahi add hoga kyunki already yaha pe paanch number added hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To koi na koi ek number hume remove karna padega tab jaake hum koi ek add kar payenge.
Customer: Main actually kisi ka bhi number remove to nahi karti main puch leti hu.
Executive: Ek bar puch lijiyega isko edit karwaiye apna apna aap number add karwaiye taki aapko information aati rahe kab koi call aaya kab miss hua kab receive hua. Saari information aapke paas honi chahiye. Tabhi aap usko follow up bhi kar paoge properly. Haanji. Theek hai? Dusra aapka ye jaise ki aap right hand side mein hi Manoj dikhta hoga. Usme click karo. Right hand side corner mein blue line mein.
Customer: Sorry kaha? Hi Manoj likha hai?
Executive: Hi Manoj right hand side corner mein blue line mein.
Customer: Okay okay haan haan.
Executive: Uske andar dekho one jaise cursor le jaoge usme Manoj naam aa raha hai uske niche one industry aa raha hai one industry ke bagal mein 3.8 star aa raha hai.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Uspe click kariyega 3.8 star pe.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai? Abhi aap dekhoge rating hamari 3.8 chal rahi hai out of five matlab out of five. Ji. Reviews 76 logon ne review diya hua hai yaha pe. Five star aapko 31% logon ne four star 14% logon ne one star 25% logon ne diya hai. To hume ye improve karna hai aage ke liye bata raha hu. Ye 3.8 thoda sa kam hai comparatively baaki sabda se bhi aur ye cheez kaafi notice karte hain aapke online market mein.
Customer: Theek hai mam main dekhungi.
Executive: Waise idea hai aapko kaise ye badhate hain?
Customer: Ji badhate kaise hain idea hai aapko?
Customer: Uh waise iske liye review dalwana padega rating and review add karwana padega.
Executive: Yes right.
Executive: Add karwane padenge naye customer aap jabhi jod rahe hain ya purane customer jinko bhi jaante hain aap unko usme apne rating dijiye unko apna aapko review karke ek message bhejiye unko aur apna rating waha pe badhwaiye five star se jyada le sakte hain lijiye yaha pe. Automatic aapki rating yaha pe badh jayegi. Wo aap karte the na pehle aapka account jaha pe aap karaate the waha pe?
Customer: Haanji haanji.
Executive: Karte the ye?
Customer: Haan karwate the.
Executive: Chalo theek hai main samajhta hu ki aapko idea hai is cheez ka aage aap kar loge is cheez ko. Right ye correct correct point. Ji. Ye ye sab main karwati thi marketing ka banda tha wo handle karta tha. But ye mujhe idea hai thoda bahut.
Executive: Okay main agar nahi hai to main ek bar bata deta hu lead manager pe jaiye.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Koi bhi customer jaise rating leni hai koi bhi aap first customer open kar lo koi bhi random. Okay. Jisse bhi aapka interaction hua hua. Jisse bhi aapka interaction hua hai usko open kiya hai waha pe aapko dekhiye niche ki taraf ask for review aa raha hoga. Jaise catalog link bhejna hota hai product is available aisa kuch aa raha hai na? Wahin pe ask for review bhi aa raha hoga.
Customer: Nahi iska option nahi hai.
Executive: Mil gaya?
Customer: Nahi iska option nahi aa raha.
Executive: Koi purana uthaiye aap agar naya uthaya to interaction jab tak nahi hoga tab tak wo nahi jayega. Koi purana ek bar dekhiye niche se sab koi.
Customer: Haan achcha aa raha hai ask for review.
Executive: Ask for review aa raha hai? Haan. Theek hai to isko thoda sa aap apply kariyega apne isme aage se isme daliye ga. Aur last aapka ye jo hai jaise ki customer ka callback aur reply reply waise aap log karte hain callback customer ka yaha pe nahi ho raha hai. To koshish kariyega yaha pe callback jo aapko lead manager mein dikhta hai na send to call ya call karne ke liye aata hai waha pe option. Ji. Wo use kariye ya to IndiaMART ka application aap download kar lijiye phone mein to aap usse bhi callback use kar sakte hain inme. Okay. Jitne jyada callback aap karoge utna aapko yaha pe result milega in terms of ranking improvement of aapke product aur ye sab mein aapko help karega promotion wagera mein wo cheez. Okay. Hai na? Aur aapka catalog correction ke liye aapne bola tha mam aage?
Customer: Nahi main nahi bola.
Executive: Koi assign karenge kisi ko yaha pe catalog correction karane ke liye?
Customer: Catalog ke liye?
Executive: Ji catalog correction ke liye kyunki kaafi sare products aise hain jisme bahut sare products aise hain jisme images wagera ki problem hai specification add nahi hai. Kai sare products aise hain jisme aaj tak matlab ek bhi single valid consumption nahi hui hai. Aur ye sabse jyada hai. Out of 59 aapne apne catalog mein 59 categories promote kara rahe hain. Out of 59 even hum char ya paanch category mein hi active hain. To baaki products hai kisliye wo kya kar rahe hain waha pe thoda sa usko agar karna hai deal to usme hum active rahenge nahi karna hai to usko remove karenge yaha se. Taki aap unme focus kar pao jitna focus karna chah rahe ho. Theek hai theek hai main karwati hu. To mere ko is bar thoda sa ye aap se help chahiye ki catalog correction ke liye please apne samne se aap call kariyega aur karwaiye please aur koi executive assign kar sakte hain uske liye special koi assign karaiyega team mein. Theek hai sir. Theek hai? Okay mam thank you so much aur aapke paas feedback jayega to please usko satisfy mark kar dijiyega aapke mail mein close kar rahe hain usko. Okay mam thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's account not actively used recently.

- Wants to add their number to receive calls.

- Catalog correction needed for inactive products.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use buyleads effectively.

- Executive guided on adding number for call notifications.

- Executive explained how to improve ratings and reviews.

- Executive explained how to use callback feature.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will add their number to receive calls.

- Customer will assign someone for catalog correction.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, ratings, pns settings
